pulltitle: 1.7: Basic memory handling and backspace ability
pullsbody:
The calculator app has been reworked to provide the user with a more advanced tool; the changes include:
- Memory addition and retrieval using `localStorage` API.
- New indicator to show memory status and error in calculus.
- Clicking the indicator will clear memory without prompt.
- New buttons to perform memory actions and backspace functions.
- Pressing equals with just one operator will duplicate the input and throw that result.
- Also, pressing equals after an operation has been done, repeats the operation with the previous input.
- A higher-quality 128px (shown in splash screen).
- Version bump to 1.7 in manifest and zip package.
pull_repo_desc: Resurrection of the calculator app that was pulled from gaia

pullsbody:
The icons were not added to the zip in previous commit.  After listing the files, there seemed to still be old files in the zip.

For future reference, to list a file in a zip:
`unzip -l application.zip`
to delete from a zip:
`zip application.zip -d style/icons/Calculator.png`
